data.eml:eml: Record of a new species of the genus Viridopromontorius Luna de Carvalho (Strepsiptera: Corioxenidae) from India with a revised key to Corioxenidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roy, Sukhendu, Hazra, Niladri (2016): Record of a new species of the genus Viridopromontorius Luna de Carvalho (Strepsiptera: Corioxenidae) from India with a revised key to Corioxenidae. Zootaxa 4154 (5): 567-573, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4154.5.5
